title: Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric
content:
Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Last Light Inn Reward __reward__

Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric

Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Capture Isobel the Selunite Cleric can be acquired during Act 2 and is a part of the Infiltrate Moonrise Towers Main Quest. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3 and earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.
